snippet: French carmaker PSA Group is expected to announce Monday that it has purchased General Motors' money-losing European car business, according to two people briefed on the matter....

headline.main: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar

lead_paragraph: French carmaker PSA Group is expected to announce Monday that it has purchased General Motors' money-losing European car business, according to two people briefed on the matter.
